summary: Over 2000 subscriptions in its first week on the steam workshop (and counting)
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i1284.photobucket.com/albums/a569/Martin_Watts/banner_zps2f2520d2.jpg[/IMG]

The Collector\'s Crypt is a combination of Armory, Trophy Room, and Treasure Chamber. Aimed mainly at the collector who likes to display his/her prized possessions. Yes there are other mods out there filled with display cases and mannequins - but none are as good looking or as compact as this ... The Collector\'s Crypt.

The new and improved VERSION 2 improves upon the first version by extending backwards and adding a brand new crypt containing several armor and weapon chambers ideal for displaying each class of armor and weapon type. The original section has been improved by adding daedric artifact and dragon claw displays, as well as some other decorative improvements.

Hard to describe everything available in this mod so please view the screenshots if you need convincing to download my mod :)

The Collector\'s Crypt offers the following:

MAIN HALL
Treasure and Display Shelves
4 faction mannequins
10 armor and weapon chambers (10 mannequins and about 64 plaques)
Alchemy and Enchanting areas
8 large display cases
Dragon Priest Mask Alter
10 bookcases

GUARD ROOM
9 Mannequins
9 Shield racks
30 Weapons racks

DISPLAY ROOM
Deadric Artifact Display (2 mannequins, 3 racks, 6 plaques, 1 shield rack)
Dragon Claw display
20 weapon plaques


LOCATION - Fast travel to Whiterun - immediately turn 90 degrees to the left - look for a trap door in front of you (in the lower guard tower thingy).

UPDATE LOG 

-Daedric display slightly altered (you wont loose items but may have to re-seat them) 
-Claws put in a cupboard (so that people who dont like them can hide them :P) 
-10 bookcases added - tested and working 
-8 more shield racks added for all those extras 
-LIGHTING - its all a bit brighter 
-Entrance changed from trapdoor to manhole 
-PLEASE REMOVE ITEMS FROM DISPLAY CASES FACING THE ENTRANCE.. THEY WILL GET SCATTERED OTHERWISE :)


*BUG LIST / IMPROVEMENTS FOR NEXT UPDATE
-final ninth mask does not seem to display properly


I hope you enjoy my first mod as much as I enjoyed making it.


CREDITS

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3841319]Haileyskyrim[/url]\'s  house mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30190]Autumn Shire[/url] which was the original inspiration and starter basement/crypt

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2388882]Alciao[/url] for the mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9994]Als Treasure Vault[/url] of which I borrowed the textures and meshes for the gold piles.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2235573]Oaristys[/url] and Tony67 for the treasures found in their [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16525]Modders Resource Pack[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4588297]Derekm17x[/url] for some ideas and textures from the great mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25082]The Forgotten Mountain Keep[/url]

I have also included [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1854512]SydZilla\'s[/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18732] Markarth city banner retexture[/url] to cover the missing vanilla file, so no need for a separate download.
author: woodap aka Dr Creeper
